ridaCollection.description: Pink & Orange Banarasi Silk Designer Lehenga Choli,What better than a Banarasi silk lehenga choli all the way from the heart of India to add colors to your festivities.This ensemble comes with a skirt in shades of pink and orange. Matching this is a blouse in pink and a dupatta in orange. Beautiful work all overskirt and dupatta border to make it more affable.
ridaCollection.sizeAndFit: Blouse Piece Length: 1-1.2 meters Lehenga Gher: 3 meters Lehenga Length: Max 42 Inch Dupatta Length : 1.5-2.5 meters
ridaCollection.materialAndCare: Blouse Banarasi Silk Lehenga Banarasi Silk Customise up to 42 Lehenga Type Circular Dupatta Net
